document.full_text: telecommunications chipmaker netlogic microsystems inc's quarterly sales missed estimates and fell 2 percent over the last quarter as chinese carriers tightened spending, and the company's shares slipped 5 percent after the bell.
document.title: netlogic revenue misses on china weakness; shares fall
lines_and_colors: telecommunications chipmaker netlogic microsystems inc's quarterly sales missed estimates and fell 2 percent over the last quarter as chinese carriers tightened spending, and the company's shares slipped 5 percent after the bell.
